title: Shokran - Exodus (2016) [320kbps]
description:
Shokran - Exodus (2016) [320kbps]


Track List:

01 Blood (Intro) 01:55

02 Creatures from the Mud 04:25

03 The Swarm 03:19

04 Living Arrows 03:33

05 Praise The Stench (..of your Fallen Idols) 03:04

06 Disfigured Hand (ft. Patrick Somoulay) 05:21

07 And Heavens began to fall (ft. Lauren Babic) 03:48

08 The Storm and The Ruler 03:01

09 Revival of Darkness 03:36

10 Firstborn 03:10


Members:

Dmitry Demyanenko - Guitar
Mike Isaev - Drums 
ValÃ¨re Youshkevich - Bass
Andrey Ivashenko - Vocals


Two years has passed after Shokran had literally shocked the metal-music world with their first LP "Supreme Truth". Two years full of different changes and happenings. The guys gained their experience, replaced two band members, had a long negotiations with the top-lables of our "Heavy world" such as Sumerian Records etc.
And now the hour has struck! This time they'll narrate you the the ancient story. You'll have a chance to join the times of the Pharaohs' reign, namely, The Plagues of Egypt times, which had persuaded the Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery, the beginning of the Exodus. 
Accompanied by the tough riffs, minor harmonic melodies, furious rhythm section, beautiful clean singing and all the lung's power screams, this LP will cause a full-immersion in the antiquity.



last.fm: http://www.last.fm/music/Shokran
